answers.answer: Hello.It's been more than 12 hours now since you posted. How are your fingers?If this was the first time you experienced numbness you need to know about neuropathy. Do you have diabetes? Diabetic neuropathy usually starts with the fingers.Was there any injury at the shoulder or elbow? Do you have any spine issues?Regards

question: My left fingers went numb, up to my elbow for 45 minutes now.  I tried to shake it off and sqeeze my fist, but no relieve.
title: Numbness on left hand
